import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import HeaderComponent from "./HeaderComponent"; import { userDetailsUpdateAction } from '../Redux/Actions/Actions' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function UserProfileController(props) { const [userFormData, setUserFormData] = useState(); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { if (props.userDetails?.result) { localStorage.setItem('token', props.userDetails.token) localStorage.setItem('UserDetails', JSON.stringify(props.userDetails.result)) setUserFormData(props.userDetails.result); } else if (localStorage.getItem('UserDetails') && localStorage.getItem('UserDetails') != '') { setUserFormData(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('UserDetails'))); } else { navigate('/'); } setLoginUserDetails(props.userDetails) }, [props.userDetails]) const onFormUpdate = (event) => { setUserFormData({ ...userFormData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } const setLoginUserDetails = (details) => { if (details) { localStorage.setItem('token', details.token) localStorage.setItem('UserDetails', JSON.stringify(details.result)) setUserDetails(details.result); closeModel(); } } const onSaveForm = (event) => { event.preventDefault() props.onUserDetailsUpdateAction(userFormData.id, userFormData); } return ( <>

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { userDetails: state.userDetails.userDetails, } } const mapDispatchtoProps = { onUserDetailsUpdateAction: (id, details) => userDetailsUpdateAction(id, details), } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchtoProps)(UserProfileController)
